comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo of Chicago White Sox players in a hotel room, probably in New York City, after their return from a five-month world tour with the New York Giants:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5051562912/]

The Cunard Line's Lusitania -- the ship that brought them back to New York harbor on March 6, 1914. Title on Bain's photo says "Lusitania with Baseball Men":
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5051564664/in/photostream/]
Another photo is labeled "Ship with Fans":
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5169599074/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo from the Chicago White Sox / New York Giants World Tour, posted on Flickr on March 11, 2011:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5517543916/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thank you Wystan for catching the date and finding the other Bain photographs related to the Chicago White Sox/NY Giants world tour.
